meanings.definition: The process of plotting points on a coordinate plane to represent data visually.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned about graphing by plotting points on a grid.
meanings.sent2: Graphing helps us understand data better by visually representing it.
meanings.sent3: I tried graphing my daily activities, but it looked like a messy scribble!
meanings.sent4: Her talent for graphing made the numbers come alive on the paper.
meanings.sent5: The art of graphing turned boring numbers into a colorful masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The act of creating a visual representation of mathematical functions or relationships.
meanings.sent1: Graphing allows us to see how mathematical functions behave visually.
meanings.sent2: She excels in graphing complex equations to show their patterns.
meanings.sent3: I attempted graphing a love equation, but it ended up looking like a tangled mess!
meanings.sent4: His graphing skills painted a clear picture of the relationship between variables.
meanings.sent5: Through graphing, the abstract world of math transforms into a colorful display of patterns.

meanings.definition: The practice of using graphs or charts to display information in a clear and organized manner.
meanings.sent1: Graphing with charts helps us present data in a structured way.
meanings.sent2: During the presentation, she explained the data by graphing it on slides.
meanings.sent3: I tried graphing with charts, but my bars ended up looking like wobbly towers!
meanings.sent4: Her graphing skills turned the complex data into an easy-to-understand visual.
meanings.sent5: The power of graphing lies in its ability to make information visually accessible and organized.
